nodes.text: Chalcedon was a planet in Tashtor sector of the Mid Rim.

During the Pre-Republic era, Chalcedon was ruled by the Rakatan Infinite Empire. A rocky and volcanic world with a semi-breathable atmosphere, it was the hub of the galactic slave trade. Chalcedon had no indigenous life-forms, but there was a way station and two colonies, with buildings made out of the local dark volcanic glass.
Chalcedon was an ancient town in the Roman province of Bithynia, on the shores of the Black Sea.
